scripts.op:program-keypairs: mkdir -p target/deploy && op read --account mzerolabs.1password.com 'op://Solana Dev/Solana Program Keys/portal-keypair' > target/deploy/portal-keypair.json && op read --account mzerolabs.1password.com 'op://Solana Dev/Solana Program Keys/earn-keypair' > target/deploy/earn-keypair.json && op read --account mzerolabs.1password.com 'op://Solana Dev/Solana Program Keys/ext-earn-keypair' > target/deploy/ext_earn-keypair.json
scripts.op:devnet-authority: op read --account mzerolabs.1password.com 'op://Solana Dev/Solana Program Keys/devnet-authority' > devnet-keypair.json
